titleStmt.title: The trial of Susannah Fowles of Hammersmith: that was try'd at London for blaspheming Jesus Christ. : And cursing the Lords Prayer. : And who also pretended to be possest with a devil.
titleStmt.author: Fowles, Susannah, defendant.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
